texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: WHEREAS:
texts.text: WHEREAS:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (A) CEIS is the owner and distributor of certain content of Xinhua News Agency relating to financial and economic information;
texts.text: (A) CEIS is the owner and distributor of certain content of Xinhua News Agency relating to financial and economic information;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: (B) CEIS wishes to appoint XFN as its licensee to distribute the content to users throughout the world in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
texts.text: (B) CEIS wishes to appoint XFN as its licensee to distribute the content to users throughout the world in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 1. DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION
texts.text: 1. DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1.1 In this Agreement unless the context otherwise requires the following words shall have the following meaning:
texts.text: 1.1 In this Agreement unless the context otherwise requires the following words shall have the following meaning:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "AFFILIATES" means any company, corporation, partnership, joint venture or other entity that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under common control with XFN;
texts.text: "AFFILIATES" means any company, corporation, partnership, joint venture or other entity that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under common control with XFN;

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "CONTENT" means real-time economic news including articles, reports, data, information and such materials that have or have been and/or will be published from time to time and that is or will be in the possession or control of CEIS from time to time, in respect of the subject matters as more particularly described in Schedule 1;
texts.text: "CONTENT" means real-time economic news including articles, reports, data, information and such materials that have or have been and/or will be published from time to time and that is or will be in the possession or control of CEIS from time to time, in respect of the subject matters as more particularly described in Schedule 1;

texts.label: text
texts.orig: EFFECTIVE DATE means 18 May 2000;
texts.text: EFFECTIVE DATE means 18 May 2000;

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "INTELLECTUAL means patents, trade marks, service marks, trade names, PROPERTY RIGHTS" design rights (whether registrable or not), any applications for the foregoing, copyright and other assignable intellectual property
texts.text: "INTELLECTUAL means patents, trade marks, service marks, trade names, PROPERTY RIGHTS" design rights (whether registrable or not), any applications for the foregoing, copyright and other assignable intellectual property

texts.text: rights (whether registrable or not) in any country, including but not limited to the format, layout, and the look and feel of any of the Content;

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "TERM" means the term as set out in Clause 7; and
texts.text: "TERM" means the term as set out in Clause 7; and

texts.label: text
texts.orig: "TERRITORY" means the world excluding the People's Republic of China.
texts.text: "TERRITORY" means the world excluding the People's Republic of China.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1.2 Words importing the singular number shall include the plural and vice versa.
texts.text: 1.2 Words importing the singular number shall include the plural and vice versa.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1.3 Words importing any particular gender shall include all other genders.
texts.text: 1.3 Words importing any particular gender shall include all other genders.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 1.4 References in this Agreement to Clauses and Schedules are to clauses of and schedules to this Agreement except where otherwise expressly stated.
texts.text: 1.4 References in this Agreement to Clauses and Schedules are to clauses of and schedules to this Agreement except where otherwise expressly stated.

texts.label: list_item

texts.text: 2.1 Exclusive Rights in the Territory: CEIS hereby grants XFN and its Affiliates an exclusive license (free of all third-party liens, claims and encumbrances) to, and to permit others to, during the Term in the Territory:

texts.text: During the Term, CEIS agrees not to appoint any other licensees for the distribution of the Content in the People's Republic of China.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2.3 The Intellectual Property Rights to use "Xinhua" as the first name of XFN and its affiliates world-wide.
texts.text: 2.3 The Intellectual Property Rights to use "Xinhua" as the first name of XFN and its affiliates world-wide.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2.4 All Intellectual Property Rights and other proprietary rights in any translated, amended, revised or updated Content independently created by XFN ("AMENDED CONTENT") shall automatically vest in XFN.
texts.text: 2.4 All Intellectual Property Rights and other proprietary rights in any translated, amended, revised or updated Content independently created by XFN ("AMENDED CONTENT") shall automatically vest in XFN.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2.5 XFN and/or its Affiliates have the right at any time to suspend or cease distributing or making the Content available to the public.
texts.text: 2.5 XFN and/or its Affiliates have the right at any time to suspend or cease distributing or making the Content available to the public.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2.6 XFN and/or its Affiliates are entitled to publish or distribute content of any third party where such content is similar to or competitive with the Content.
texts.text: 2.6 XFN and/or its Affiliates are entitled to publish or distribute content of any third party where such content is similar to or competitive with the Content.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2.7 XFN and/or its Affiliate(s) shall have the right to charge users to access or view the Content and/or sub-license the Content to third parties for re-distribution to users. Revenues generated thereby shall be for the account of XFN or its Affiliates, and CEIS shall not be entitled to, nor make any action, claim or demand in relation thereto. XFN's only payment obligation to CEIS in consideration of the rights granted pursuant to this Clause 2 is set forth in Clause 4.
texts.text: 2.7 XFN and/or its Affiliate(s) shall have the right to charge users to access or view the Content and/or sub-license the Content to third parties for re-distribution to users. Revenues generated thereby shall be for the account of XFN or its Affiliates, and CEIS shall not be entitled to, nor make any action, claim or demand in relation thereto. XFN's only payment obligation to CEIS in consideration of the rights granted pursuant to this Clause 2 is set forth in Clause 4.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 2.8 XFN does not intend and is not under any obligation to edit or review the Content licensed herein for accuracy or appropriateness or compliance with any applicable laws or regulations.
texts.text: 2.8 XFN does not intend and is not under any obligation to edit or review the Content licensed herein for accuracy or appropriateness or compliance with any applicable laws or regulations.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3. DELIVERY OF CONTENT
texts.text: 3. DELIVERY OF CONTENT

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3.1 During the Term of this Agreement, CEIS shall supply the Content of XFN by such means of delivery or transmission as may be reasonably required by XFN including by online transmission.
texts.text: 3.1 During the Term of this Agreement, CEIS shall supply the Content of XFN by such means of delivery or transmission as may be reasonably required by XFN including by online transmission.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 3.2 CEIS shall use its best endeavours to ensure that the Content is made available to XFN on a continuous, uninterrupted real-time basis.
texts.text: 3.2 CEIS shall use its best endeavours to ensure that the Content is made available to XFN on a continuous, uninterrupted real-time basis.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 4.1 In consideration of the rights and obligations of the Parties, XFN shall pay to CEIS US$1.1 million (United States Dollars One Million and One
texts.text: 4.1 In consideration of the rights and obligations of the Parties, XFN shall pay to CEIS US$1.1 million (United States Dollars One Million and One

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Hundred Thousand) for a term of twenty (20) years, in cash or such other consideration as the Parties may agree. The payment schedule shall be by five (5) instalments of US$220,000 each. The first instalment will be effect on condition that XFN can raise at least US$1.1 million additional funding in 2002.
texts.text: Hundred Thousand) for a term of twenty (20) years, in cash or such other consideration as the Parties may agree. The payment schedule shall be by five (5) instalments of US$220,000 each. The first instalment will be effect on condition that XFN can raise at least US$1.1 million additional funding in 2002.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 7. TERM
texts.text: 7. TERM

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7.1 This Agreement shall take effect from the Effective Date and continue in full force and effect for twenty (20) years thereafter, unless otherwise terminated in accordance with Clause 8.
texts.text: 7.1 This Agreement shall take effect from the Effective Date and continue in full force and effect for twenty (20) years thereafter, unless otherwise terminated in accordance with Clause 8.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 7.2 This Agreement may be renewed for an additional term of ten (10) years by notice in writing given by XFN to CEIS at the expiry of the Term, for a consideration to be mutually agreed.
texts.text: 7.2 This Agreement may be renewed for an additional term of ten (10) years by notice in writing given by XFN to CEIS at the expiry of the Term, for a consideration to be mutually agreed.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 8. TERMINATION
texts.text: 8. TERMINATION

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 8.1 XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice to the CEIS.
texts.text: 8.1 XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice to the CEIS.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 8.2 Either Party may terminate this Agreement:
texts.text: 8.2 Either Party may terminate this Agreement:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is not capable of being remedied;
texts.text: if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is not capable of being remedied;

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring remedy; and
texts.text: if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring remedy; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.
texts.text: if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 8.3 Upon termination of the Agreement:
texts.text: 8.3 Upon termination of the Agreement:

texts.orig: CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate effect; and
texts.text: CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate effect; and

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the unexpired Term of this Agreement, together with interest from the date those sums were paid until the date of full refund.
texts.text: in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the unexpired Term of this Agreement, together with interest from the date those sums were paid until the date of full refund.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 9. FURTHER ASSURANCE
texts.text: 9. FURTHER ASSURANCE

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Each Party agrees, at its own expense, to take any further action and to execute any further documents or instruments as the other Party may reasonably request to give effect to the transactions contemplated by, and to the terms of, this Agreement. In particular, and without limiting the foregoing, the Parties agree to amend this Agreement as may be necessary to comply with applicable laws, including without limitation the laws of the People's Republic of China.
texts.text: Each Party agrees, at its own expense, to take any further action and to execute any further documents or instruments as the other Party may reasonably request to give effect to the transactions contemplated by, and to the terms of, this Agreement. In particular, and without limiting the foregoing, the Parties agree to amend this Agreement as may be necessary to comply with applicable laws, including without limitation the laws of the People's Republic of China.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 10. ENTIRE AGREEMENT; AMENDMENTS
texts.text: 10. ENTIRE AGREEMENT; AMENDMENTS

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between CEIS and XFN and supersedes any prior written or oral agreement between them in relation to its subject matter. Any amendment of this Agreement shall be in writing and signed by CEIS and XFN.
texts.text: This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between CEIS and XFN and supersedes any prior written or oral agreement between them in relation to its subject matter. Any amendment of this Agreement shall be in writing and signed by CEIS and XFN.

texts.label: section_header

texts.text: 11. SEVERANCE

texts.label: text
texts.orig: If at any time any provision of this Agreement is or becomes illegal, invalid or unenforceable in any respect, the legality, validity and enforceability of the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall not be affected or impaired thereby.
texts.text: If at any time any provision of this Agreement is or becomes illegal, invalid or unenforceable in any respect, the legality, validity and enforceability of the remaining provisions of this Agreement shall not be affected or impaired thereby.

texts.label: section_header

texts.text: 13. COSTS AND EXPENSES

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Each party shall bear its own costs (including but not limited to legal costs) and disbursements of and incidental to the preparation, negotiation and execution of this Agreement and all ancillary documentation.
texts.text: Each party shall bear its own costs (including but not limited to legal costs) and disbursements of and incidental to the preparation, negotiation and execution of this Agreement and all ancillary documentation.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 15. NOTICE
texts.text: 15. NOTICE

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Each notice, demand or other communication given or made under this Agreement shall
texts.text: Each notice, demand or other communication given or made under this Agreement shall

texts.label: text
texts.orig: be in writing and delivered or sent to the relevant Party's Managing Director or General Manager at its aforesaid address (or such other address as the addressee may specify by five days' prior written notice to the other Party). Any notice, demand or other communication so addressed to the relevant Party shall be deemed to have been delivered (a) if given or made by letter by hand, when actually delivered to the relevant address against receipt; (b) if given or made by letter by post, two business days after posting; and (c) if given or made by fax, when dispatched and received in good order.
texts.text: be in writing and delivered or sent to the relevant Party's Managing Director or General Manager at its aforesaid address (or such other address as the addressee may specify by five days' prior written notice to the other Party). Any notice, demand or other communication so addressed to the relevant Party shall be deemed to have been delivered (a) if given or made by letter by hand, when actually delivered to the relevant address against receipt; (b) if given or made by letter by post, two business days after posting; and (c) if given or made by fax, when dispatched and received in good order.

texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: 16. GOVERNING LAW AND ARBITRATION
texts.text: 16. GOVERNING LAW AND ARBITRATION

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 16.1 The English language version shall prevail in the event of any discrepancy between the interpretation of the English and the Chinese versions of this Agreement. This Agreement is governed by and shall be construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong
texts.text: 16.1 The English language version shall prevail in the event of any discrepancy between the interpretation of the English and the Chinese versions of this Agreement. This Agreement is governed by and shall be construed in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: 16.2 The Parties shall attempt to resolve any dispute, controversy or claim arising out of this Agreement through good faith consultation and negotiations. If the Parties fail to resolve the dispute through negotiation, such dispute shall be referred to and be resolved by arbitration in accordance with the UNCITRAL Arbitration Rules as may be amended from time to time. The place of arbitration shall be in Hong Kong. The language to be used in the arbitral proceedings shall be English. There shall be one arbitrator to be agreed by Parties. If the Parties are unable to agree on an arbitrator, the International Chamber of Commerce shall appoint one.
texts.text: 16.2 The Parties shall attempt to resolve any dispute, controversy or claim arising out of this Agreement through good faith consultation and negotiations. If the Parties fail to resolve the dispute through negotiation, such dispute shall be referred to and be resolved by arbitration in accordance with the UNCITRAL Arbitration Rules as may be amended from time to time. The place of arbitration shall be in Hong Kong. The language to be used in the arbitral proceedings shall be English. There shall be one arbitrator to be agreed by Parties. If the Parties are unable to agree on an arbitrator, the International Chamber of Commerce shall appoint one.

texts.orig: IN WITNESS WHEREOF this Agreement has been executed on the day and year first above written.
